pages.text: $(#630000)Trauma is effectively an omen of death. Once you have it, you have 6 chimes, with the effect increasing in amplifier each time. The only way to push it back is to kill something.$(br)Any mob will work, but it has to be by your hands.$(br)Don't let that last chime play.
$(#630000)This effect is most commonly applied by $(l:threat/salt)Creeping Salt$()$(#630000) on contact. It would be best to avoid touching the blocks.
